author: Buddha
quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

author: Buddha
quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

author: Buddha
quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

author: Buddha
quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

author: Rumi
quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.

author: Rumi
quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in new form.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can’t help them, at least don’t hurt them.
